title: Spur Gear Design
description: CADQuery pseudocode for generating a spur gear with 24 teeth, 60mm pitch diameter, and 5mm bore.
initialization:
CREATE workplane on XY plane
SET tolerance = 0.05
INITIALIZE coordinate system

main_blocks.pseudocode:
CREATE circle with radius=30 on workplane
ASSIGN result to variable 'pitch_circle'
main_blocks.comments: Creates the base circle for the gear

main_blocks.pseudocode:
EXTRUDE 'pitch_circle' with distance=8
ASSIGN result to variable 'gear_blank'

CREATE circle with radius=2.5 on workplane
ASSIGN result to variable 'bore_hole_circle'
main_blocks.comments: Creates the circle for the bore hole

main_blocks.pseudocode:
CUT 'bore_hole_circle' from 'gear_blank'
ASSIGN result to variable 'gear_with_bore'
main_blocks.comments: Cuts the bore hole through the gear blank

main_blocks.pseudocode:
CREATE involute gear profile with number_of_teeth=24, module=2.5, pressure_angle=20
POSITION profile on 'gear_blank'
ASSIGN result to variable 'gear_profile'
main_blocks.comments: Generates the involute gear tooth profile

main_blocks.pseudocode:
CUT 'gear_profile' from 'gear_with_bore'
ASSIGN result to variable 'gear_with_teeth'
main_blocks.comments: Cuts the gear teeth into the gear blank

main_blocks.pseudocode:
SELECT outer edges of 'gear_with_teeth'
APPLY fillet with radius=0.5 to selected edges
ASSIGN result to variable 'final_gear'
main_blocks.comments: Applies a chamfer to the outer edges

finalization:
EXPORT 'final_gear' to STEP format
SAVE to output file
CLEANUP temporary variables
